summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Financial Dashboard with real-time crypto, currency, and metals data. All major features working correctly including AI predictions, historical charts, and responsive design.

minor_issues.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop in Recharts Dots component
minor_issues.impact: Console warning only, no functional impact

minor_issues.issue: AI analysis shows 'temporarily unavailable' message instead of detailed text analysis
minor_issues.impact: Numerical predictions work fine, only descriptive text affected

passed_tests: Backend API health check (9/9 endpoints passing)
Currency data display with Canadian Dollar prominently featured
Precious metals prices (Gold, Silver, Platinum, Palladium)
Asset selection functionality - clicking cards shows analysis
Historical 1-week chart display with proper data points
AI predictions for 1 week, 1 month, and 1 year timeframes
Tab switching between Crypto, Currencies, and Metals
Modern trader interface styling and responsiveness
Mobile responsiveness across all screen sizes
Real-time data fetching from external APIs (CoinGecko, Yahoo Finance)
Caching system with 5-minute expiry working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor console warning and AI text issue)
